document_data.name: Elminster's Hideout
document_data.mainbody: e safehold was located near the central [[earthmote]] of Coliar. It slowly revolved around the territory of the [[red dragon]] [[Firebrand Flametongue]]. It emitted a constant low humming noise that could be heard from over {{SI|0.25|mi|long=yes}} away.
document_data.Location: The safehold was located near the central [[earthmote]] of Coliar. It slowly revolved around the territory of the [[red dragon]] [[Firebrand Flametongue]]. It emitted a constant low humming noise that could be heard from over {{SI|0.25|mi|long=yes}} away.
document_data.Structure:
From the outside, the safehold appeared to be a perfectly reflective metallic sphere almost {{SI|250|ft|long=yes}} in diameter. Due to its orbital motion, it reflected a faint rainbow-like pattern of light.

If investigated with magic such as a ''[[detect magic]]'' spell, the outer walls revealed a glowing red piece of beautiful writing that could only be read with magic such as a ''[[comprehend languages]]'' spell.
document_data.Defenses: The sphere was impenetrable to any [[divination]] or [[scry]]ing spells from the outside. It could only be accessed via the ''[[Elminster's evasion]]'' spell in effect on Elminster or if someone wearing a non-magical ring bearing Elminster's name touched the outside wall without making any sound.
document_data.History: Elminster originally built his hideout sometime in the 11{{th}} century [[DR]] with the purpose of monitoring the activities of the Torilian dragon Firebrand Flametongue. After concluding that the dragon had the intention of retiring, Elminster repurposed the location as his hideout.
